article.title: Examples_of_differential_equations
article.paragraph: Differential equationsarise in many problems inphysics,engineering, and other sciences. The following examples show how to solve differential equations in a few simple cases when an exact solution exists.
article.heading: Separable first-order ordinary differential equations
article.paragraph: Equations in the form\frac {dy}{dx} = f(x)g(y)are called separable and solved by\frac {dy}{g(y)} = f(x)dxand thus\int\frac {dy}{g(y)} = \int f(x)dx. Prior to dividing byg(y), one needs to check if there are stationary (also called equilibrium)solutionsy=constsatisfyingg(y)=0.
